  1. News

  1. The Woodlands Township to hold Board of Directors Meetings

    THE WOODLANDS, TEXAS (April 18, 2019) – The Woodlands Township Board of Directors will hold two meetings on Wednesday, April 24, 2019, at The Woodlands Township, 2801 Technology Forest Boulevard, The Woodlands, Texas 77381. Read on...

  2. Texas TreeVentures Aerial Adventure Course now open

    THE WOODLANDS, TEXAS (April 17, 2019)–Texas TreeVentures, a program of The Woodlands Township, is now open for reservations. Please visit the Texas TreeVentures website for more information and to view reservation availability at www.texastreeventures.com Read on...

  3. The Woodlands Convention & Visitors Bureau to hold Board of Directors Meeting

    THE WOODLANDS, TEXAS (April 17, 2019) – The Woodlands Convention & Visitors Bureau will hold a Board Meeting Wednesday, April 24, 2019. The meeting will be held at 11:30 a.m. at The Woodlands Township, 2801 Technology Forest Boulevard, The Woodlands, Read on...

  4. Solid waste services not impacted by holiday weekend

    THE WOODLANDS, TEXAS (April 16, 2019) – The Woodlands Township reminds residents that all solid waste services in the community will occur as usual over the upcoming holiday. There will be no interruption or delay of curbside pick-up of trash, recycling, Read on...

  5. Don’t Miss the next National Prescription Drug Take Back Day!

    THE WOODLANDS, TEXAS (April 15, 2019) – The next National Prescription Drug Take Back Day is Saturday, April 27, 2019, from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. The Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA) will collect expired or unwanted prescription medications for safe Read on...
View All
/CivicAlerts.aspx
  1. Board of Directors

  1. Message from the Chairman 


    Welcome to The Woodlands Township website. 

    As Chairman of the Board of Directors, I am pleased to welcome you and am confident that you will find
    our newly redesigned website to be a valuable tool. At this site, you will be able to connect with information
    about Township services, discover new events and programs and access public meeting videos, press releases and social media channels. 

    Founded in 1974 and covering 28,000 acres of residential and commercial development, The Woodlands is one of the most progressive and innovative master-planned communities in the United States. [Read On...]


  2. The Woodlands Township Board of Directors


    The Woodlands Township is governed by a seven-member Board of Directors. Directors are elected by the community at large to serve two-year staggered terms. The Board of Directors serves as the legislative body, sets policy and approves the budget.

    • About the Board of Directors
    • Agendas and Minutes
    • Board Meeting Videos

Social Corner

Tweets by @TheTownshipTX
  1. The Woodlands Township Spotlight

  1. Emergency Preparedness Event
    The Woodlands Township Neighborhood Watch is hosting an Emergency Preparedness Event for community members on March 30, 2019. Don't miss exciting demonstrations and a chance to meet with local organizations and public safety organizations. Find out how to make an emergency plan, stay informed in an emergency and so much more at this fun and educational family event! Read More


  1. Incorporation Planning

    To prepare the community for future governance decisions, the Township Board initiated an Incorporation Planning Study in 2018. Public meetings are ongoing, and a designated website has the latest information. Read more

  1. Muddy Trails Bash

     

    Don't miss the annual Muddy Trails Bash on Saturday, April 6, 2019! The event will feature 10K and 5K trail runs, the Little Muddy Kids’ One Mile Fun Run and a 2K-9 fun run for you and your dog. Be sure to check the Traffic Impact page for important road closure information for residents. Read More
